designs.name: Modern Corporate Reception
designs.description: Clean and professional reception area creating a strong first impression
designs.flooring: Polished marble or large-format vitrified tiles
designs.walls: Neutral walls with branded accent panel
designs.ceiling: Designer false ceiling with cove lighting
designs.furniture: Reception desk, visitor seating, side tables
designs.prompt_keywords: modern corporate reception, office lobby design, professional entrance

designs.name: Luxury Grand Lobby
designs.description: High-end lobby with premium materials and elegant detailing
designs.walls: Stone or veneer walls with metallic accents
designs.prompt_keywords: luxury lobby, grand office reception, premium commercial entrance

designs.name: Minimal Chic Reception
designs.description: Sleek and clutter-free reception with contemporary elegance
designs.prompt_keywords: minimal reception design, modern office lobby

designs.name: Industrial Urban Lobby
designs.description: Bold industrial-style lobby with urban personality
designs.prompt_keywords: industrial lobby design, urban office reception

designs.name: Biophilic Welcome Lobby
designs.description: Nature-inspired lobby creating a calm and welcoming experience
designs.prompt_keywords: biophilic lobby, green office reception, nature inspired entrance

designs.name: Tech Futuristic Reception
designs.description: High-tech lobby reflecting innovation and future-forward branding
designs.prompt_keywords: futuristic reception, tech office lobby, smart entrance

designs.name: Brand Story Reception
designs.description: Lobby designed to showcase company culture and brand journey
designs.walls: Story wall with graphics and timelines
designs.prompt_keywords: brand focused reception, storytelling office lobby

designs.name: Hospitality-Inspired Lobby
designs.description: Warm and welcoming lobby inspired by hotel reception areas
designs.ceiling: Soft false ceiling with warm lighting
designs.prompt_keywords: hotel style lobby, hospitality inspired office reception

designs.name: Creative Agency Reception
designs.description: Energetic and expressive lobby for creative workplaces
designs.prompt_keywords: creative agency reception, vibrant office lobby

designs.name: Cost-Effective Reception
designs.prompt_keywords: budget office reception, functional lobby design
